subtitle: (Kilimanjaro, Arusha, Meru na Pare)
title: Historia ya Kanisa la Kiinjili la Kilutheri Africa ya Mashariki, 1902-1912
by_statement: kimetafsiriwa katika Kiswahili na T.L.M. Marealle na msaidizi wake Rusk Shirima Kishimba.

description.value: On the History of the Evangelical Lutheran Church in Tanzania from 1902-1912.

notes.value:
In Swahili.
Translated from the English text, A history of the Leipzig Mission on Kilimanjaro in the neighbouring mountains, which was also a translation from the original German text, Am Fusse der Bergriesen Ostafrikas.
"H. Adolphi"--Pref. to the 1st ed.
